root.name: Zaviga
root.description: You play as a jet that can transform into a tank. The planet is under attack by horrible bug army that also has robotic machines in it's ranks. You are equipped with 2 laser cannons for things on your plane and bombs for things below. The game scrolls infinitely stopping for an occasional fight against a cannon mountain that you defeat by destroying a glowing weak spot. With each scroll through the game introduces new enemies and obstacles like flying rocks and underwater enemies.
